answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Gary – I hope the following RFP’s are helpful:
Mount Vernon, NY – Tennis Center Operation/Management
http://cmvny.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/03/Request-for-Proposal-Tennis-Recreation-Facility.pdf 
Highland Village, TX - Tennis Management Services 
http://www.highlandvillage.org/DocumentCenter/View/448 
Mecklenburg County, NC - tennis instructors to provide tennis lessons, clinics, camps and youth leagues
http://charmeck.org/mecklenburg/county/parkandrec/news/documents/tennis%20rfp.pdf 
West Sacramento, CA – TENNIS PROFESSIONAL AND/OR MANAGEMENT GROUP   http://www.cityofwestsacramento.org/civica/bids/inc/blobfetch.asp?blobID=4806 
Ashville, NC – TENNIS CENTER OPERATIONS
http://www.ashevillenc.gov/Portals/0/city-documents/purchasing/121913RFPTennisCenterBid.pdf 
Sandy Springs, GA - Tennis Center Operations  http://sandyspringsga.gov/SandySprings/media/Purchasing/13-257_City_of_Sandy_Springs_Tennis_Center_Operations/RFP-Tennis-Center-Operating-2012-Revised.pdf 
Miami Beach, FL - COMPREHENSIVE PROFESSIONAL TENNIS MANAGEMENT AND OPERATIONS SERVICES AT THE CITY'S PARK TENNIS CENTERS
file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Pamela/My%20Documents/Downloads/C2A-Issue%20RFP%20Tennis%20Management%20At%20Flamingo%20And%20North%20Shore%20Park%20Tennis%20Centers%20.pdf 
San Francisco, CA – Management of the Pro Shop, Food and Beverage Concessions and the provision of Professional Tennis Instruction
http://sfrecpark.org/golden-gate-park-tennis-complex-rfp-2/ 
Coronado, CA – Tennis Shop Concessionaire
http://www.coronado.ca.us/egov/documents/1363205842_02328.pdf 
Pam
Pamela Muse
West Regional Director
Corporate Partner Liaison
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450 Office
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org
www.transformgov.org
www.tlgconference.org

author: Gary Palmer
text:
I am looking for RFP templates for Recreational Services (specifically tennis).
please email me at gpalmer@townoffarragut.org
Thanks!
title: RFP for Recreational Services
